918760.name: Hyper Simon X: Original Soundtrack
918760.description:
The Hyper Simon X: Original Soundtrack is a collection of 5 awesome original tracks (including 2 versions of each looped and complete) plus a trailer song from the great brazilian composer Derek Volker!

  • Bad Hangover in the Other Side of the Galaxy
  • Dirty Pub with Good Drinks
  • The Void Flip Flops
  • Exit the Void
  • The Space Heroes Fanfarre
  • Hyperspeed 3
  • Dirty Pub with Good Drinks (Loop)
  • The Void Flip Flops (Loop)
  • Exit the Void (Trailer Version)
  • The Space Heroes Fanfarre (Loop)
  • Hyperspeed 3 (Loop)

You can access the musics on the folder "//steamapps\common\Hyper Simon X
918760.supported_languages: 英语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
